name: C. George and Job
statement:
The new ITone 6 has been released recently and George got really keen to
buy it. Unfortunately, he didn’t have enough money, so George was going
to work as a programmer. Now he faced the following problem at the
work.Given a sequence of integers . You are to choose pairs of integers:
in such a way that the value of sum is maximal possible. Help George to
cope with the task.
